title: Some are more equal than others
creator_credit: Box Hill College of Technical and Further Education
brief_description: Briefly traces the history of the development of equal opportunity. A representative from the Equal Opportunity Board and the Youth Affairs Council discuss the equal opportunity legislation and how it affects youth.
